  Manages an Ory Network JSON Web Key Set (JWKS).
  JSON Web Keys are used for signing and encrypting tokens. This resource allows you to
  generate and manage custom key sets for your Ory project.
  Example Usage
  Generate RSA Key for Signing
  
  resource "ory_json_web_key_set" "signing" {
    set_id    = "my-signing-keys"
    key_id    = "sig-key-1"
    algorithm = "RS256"
    use       = "sig"

  resource "ory_json_web_key_set" "encryption" {
    set_id    = "my-encryption-keys"

    algorithm = "ES256"
    use       = "enc"
  }

  JWK sets can be imported using their set ID:
  
  terraform import ory_json_web_key_set.signing my-signing-keys

# ory_json_web_key_set (Resource)

Manages an Ory Network JSON Web Key Set (JWKS).

JSON Web Keys are used for signing and encrypting tokens. This resource allows you to
generate and manage custom key sets for your Ory project.

## Example Usage

### Generate RSA Key for Signing

```hcl
resource "ory_json_web_key_set" "signing" {
  set_id    = "my-signing-keys"
  key_id    = "sig-key-1"
  algorithm = "RS256"
  use       = "sig"
}
```

### Generate EC Key for Encryption

```hcl
resource "ory_json_web_key_set" "encryption" {
  set_id    = "my-encryption-keys"
  key_id    = "enc-key-1"
  algorithm = "ES256"
  use       = "enc"
}
```

## Import

JWK sets can be imported using their set ID:

```shell
terraform import ory_json_web_key_set.signing my-signing-keys
```

## Example Usage

```terraform
# RSA signing key set
resource "ory_json_web_key_set" "signing" {
  set_id    = "token-signing-keys"
  algorithm = "RS256"
  use       = "sig"
}

# ECDSA signing key set (smaller, faster)
resource "ory_json_web_key_set" "ecdsa_signing" {
  set_id    = "ecdsa-signing-keys"
  algorithm = "ES256"
  use       = "sig"
}

# Encryption key set
resource "ory_json_web_key_set" "encryption" {
  set_id    = "encryption-keys"
  algorithm = "RS256"
  use       = "enc"
}

output "signing_key_set_id" {
  value = ory_json_web_key_set.signing.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `algorithm` (String) The algorithm for the key: RS256, ES256, ES512, HS256, HS512.
- `key_id` (String) The Key ID (kid) for the generated key.
- `set_id` (String) The ID of the JSON Web Key Set.
- `use` (String) The intended use: sig (signature) or enc (encryption).

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Internal Terraform ID (same as set_id).
- `keys` (String, Sensitive) The JSON Web Key Set as a JSON string (public parts only).
